text: Good day how are you?
I am doing great!  How are you?
Very well thank you. Did you enjoy your holiday yesterday?
I did, thank you for asking!  We went to a baseball game!  Did you have a good holiday?
Yes. Thank you. I would like to ask have you heard of the charity Save the Children?
Yes I have!
It is wonderful and does a lot of good around the world. They help children with better living conditions every day.
That sounds wonderful.  Do we want to agree on $2 to help this organization?
Is that the amount that you feel comfortable with?
Yes absolutely.  It sounds like a wonderful organization and that is the maximum amount we can donate.
That is very generous of you. I feel every little bit must help make a difference.
I agree completely!
Then yes the 2 dollars is an agreement. Thank you again on their benefit.
Thank you for coming to an agreement!
I hope you enjoy the beautiful day and the rest of your week.
Thank you!  I hope you do too!  Have a wonderful day :)
Thank you. And you can read about the charity at  URL
Great!  I will do that!
Goodbye and thanks again
Goodbye!  Thank you for your help!
